attack-object.name: Account Manipulation
attack-object.score-comment: This control may be able to detect when adversaries use cloud accounts to elevate privileges through manipulation of IAM or access policies. This monitoring can be fine tuned to specific assets, policies, and organizations.

attack-object.name: Additional Cloud Credentials
attack-object.score-comment: This control may be able to detect when adversaries use cloud accounts to elevate privileges through manipulation of IAM or access policies for the creation of additional accounts. This monitoring can be fine tuned to specific assets, policies, and organizations.

attack-object.name: Valid Accounts
attack-object.score-comment: This control may be able to detect when adversaries use valid cloud accounts to elevate privileges through manipulation of IAM or access policies. This monitoring can be fine tuned to specific assets, policies, and organizations.

attack-object.name: Cloud Accounts
attack-object.score-comment: This control may be able to detect when adversaries use valid cloud accounts to elevate privileges through manipulation of IAM or access policies. This monitoring can be fine tuned to specific assets, policies, and organizations.
